common_0278_rival_02:
[VAR BD06(0000)]From today on, this is your room,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0278_rival_a:
Actually, it’s as new to me as it is to you.
Never been in here before.[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0278_rival_b:
Maybe check out your new bed? Looks comfy.
And you must be pretty worn out from all this\r
stuff happening on your very first day, huh?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0278_rival_c:
A quick rest on a bed is all you need to get
yourself and your Pokémon healthy again![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0278_rival_03:
I’ll see you tomorrow, when you’ve rested up.
Then we can battle even more! Take care![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0278_kari_01: Seems like it’s time for a good rest!
